name: Disenchanter
description: Adds two cube recepies for disenchanting and upgrading items. Disenchanting converts any item to a non-magic version of it. This can be an ethereal or regular white item. Upgrading increases the quality to Exceptional or Elite. By default, you need one jewel or ring to convert an item, but you can change the required ingredient in the config.
author: erSch

config.description: You can choose an item other than a jewel to use in the recipe instead.

config.description: Basic (normal), exceptional (nightmare) ore elite (hell) item quality

config.name: Free Upgrade
